thread.title: 'Jessica Jones' Digital Comic Serves as Prequel to Netflix's Series
thread.title_full: 'Jessica Jones' Digital Comic Serves as Prequel to Netflix's Series

author: AceShowbiz.com
title: 'Jessica Jones' Digital Comic Serves as Prequel to Netflix's Series
text:
Comments Marvel has made available 'Jessica Jones' digital comic for free as a preview to the upcoming Netflix series. 
Before it's made available for streaming on Netflix, " Marvel's Jessica Jones " is teased in a digital comic. On Wednesday, October 7, Marvel released a free comic that serves as a prequel to the upcoming Netflix series. The said issue also features Daredevil . In a preview of the digital comic, it appears that Jessica Jones is handling a case involving a man who has recently been beaten down by Matt Murdock a.k.a. Daredevil. The digital comic is available for download on ComiXology and Marvel's own digital comic store . The "Jessica Jones" series stars Krysten Ritter as the titular heroine, who battles demons from within and without after her short-lived stint as a Super Hero ended in tragedy. She is now rebuilding her personal life and career as a detective who gets pulled into cases involving people with extraordinary abilities in New York City. It is set to be released November 20 on Netflix. Mike Colter will be introduced as Luke Cage on the show before later getting his own solo series.
